attributes.legal-text: Purchased content or services are not refundable or transferable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or credit.
attributes.long-description:
Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ and PS Vita versions!

Equal elements of action, exploration and puzzle solving await you! Save scientists and uncover the mysteries of an ill-fated research trip. Study and manipulate your environment; blast and dig through rock and ice, unleashing floods of water, lava, gas, magnetic oil and even deadly stomach acid!

This content is only compatible with PlayStation®Vita.

Content file size: 288MB

Copyright：
© 2014 Double Eleven Limited and Q-Games Ltd. PixelJunk is a trade mark of Q-Games Ltd. All rights reserved.

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement.
attributes.name: PixelJunk™ Shooter Ultimate full game
